CustomField.description: ** System Calculated ** System generated message that provides context for the Log - the value of this field is used when generating the "Description" for the Log and is populated by a system trigger.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated ** System generated message that provides context for the Log - the value of this field is used when generating the "Description" for the Log and is populated by a system trigger.
CustomField.label: System Message
